Counter-Strike: Source is one of the most fun games i've ever played, you will probably love it.
I love how the whole games is just community servers, the game is just for fun, no ranks, stats or nothing, it's just about having fun. I would have bought the game even if it was 50 bucks, in addition it also has way less hackers and cheaters than in CS:GO. Absolutely worth the money.
